      • testRandomUsername

        @Test
public void testRandomUsername()
                              throws Exception
        AppIdentityFilter expect the appkey as username. If the user (header 'x-gbif-user') does not match appkey then the APP role will not be provided.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testAppkeyNotInWhiteList

        @Test
public void testAppkeyNotInWhiteList()
                                    throws Exception
        Try with the appkey which matches the user header but not present in the white list. So the APP role will not be provided.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testRightRequest

        @Test
public void testRightRequest()
                            throws Exception
        Try with the appkey which matches the user header and presents in the white list. The user should be successfully authenticated with the APP role.
        Throws:
        Exception
